title: Optimizing interface concentration and electric fields for enhanced lithium deposition behavior in lithium metal anodes
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01816H, Paper
Jiaxiang Liu, Haiming Hua, Jie Lin, Yongliang Deng, Nanbiao Pei, Peng Zhang, Jin-Chao Dong, Jian-Feng Li, Jinbao Zhao
Understanding dynamic fluctuations in complex multi-physics fields at the electrolyte/electrode interface is crucial for explaining the lithium deposition mechanism and developing efficient interface structures, but there are significant challenges. Here,...
